item.description: We have two great reasons to visit this month! One of our very own meet up members Kiyomi Sweeney will be available to discuss her work...Watercolor Pet Portraits! A Must See! This month we also celebrate International Talk Like a Pirate Day! Aaargh. We'll have silly games where pups can Walk the Plank, Hunt for Buried Treasure, & Have a Real Pirate Photo Shoot! Special Treat for pups that come dressed in the spirit of the day. Current Proof of Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella Hope to see you all there! Love & puppy kisses Auntie Becky
item.name: Fun Fall Festivities for our Furry Friends
